definition: lit. to collect fireflies and study by their light (idiom); fig. ambitious student from impoverished background/burning the midnight oil
to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize
to reflect (light)/to shine/to project (an image onto a screen etc)
snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean
